edu.berkeley.compbio.phyloutils

Class HybridRootedPhylogeny<T extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.berkeley.compbio.phyloutils.HybridRootedPhylogeny<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.davidsoergel.trees.TaxonMergingPhylogeny<T>

    public class HybridRootedPhylogeny<T extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements com.davidsoergel.trees.TaxonMergingPhylogeny<T>
    Sometimes we have branch lengths on one phylogeny, but we want to know distances between nodes that are not on that phylogeny. In that case we may want to travel up a different phylogeny (e.g., the NCBI taxonomy) until we find matching nodes, and thereby get at least a lower bound on the distance.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    David Soergel
